reviewText: We love Kipper at our house. The jazzy soundtrack and low-key antics are perfect for bedtime. Each episode is about 15 mins long, so it's easy to say "Last one, then lights out."

Such a cute, well-made cartoon. Kipper and his buddy, Tiger the Miniature Schnauzer, plus Pig and Arnold and Jake -- are all gentle, fun-loving characters. Very classy, very funny. You will enjoy it along with your toddler or pre-schooler! Five stars!
